content: which limits the 4-hour rolling average partition use to the defined capacity value. Soft capping controls the maximum 4-hour rolling average usage (the last 4-hour average value at every 5-minute interval), but does not limit the maximum instantaneous partition use. You can also use an LPAR group capacity limit, which sets soft capping by PR/SM for a group of logical partitions that are running z/OS. Only the 4-hour rolling average use of the LPAR group is tracked, which allows use peaks above the group capacity value.  Sysplex licensing Sysplex licensing allows monthly software licenses to be aggregated across a qualified Parallel Sysplex. To be eligible for Sysplex pricing aggregation, the customer environment must meet hardware, software, operation, and verification criteria to be considered “actively coupled”. For more information about Sysplex licensing, see this web page.  Taylor Fit Software Consumption Taylor Fit Software Consumption Solution is a cloud-like, usage-based
